meanings.sent1: I love to eat a variety of vegies with my dinner.
meanings.sent2: My mom always makes sure we have fresh vegies in the fridge.
meanings.sent3: The little rabbit happily munched on the crunchy vegie.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a colorful patchwork of different vegies growing together.
meanings.sent5: The farmer proudly displayed his harvest of vibrant vegies at the market.

meanings.sent1: My friend is a dedicated vegie and always chooses the salad option.
meanings.sent2: Being a vegie means you have to be creative with your meals.
meanings.sent3: The vegie happily chomped on a carrot stick at the picnic.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the ultimate vegie in her group of friends.
meanings.sent5: The vegie's fridge was always stocked with fresh produce.

meanings.definition: A dish made primarily of vegetables.
meanings.sent1: The stir-fried vegie was a hit at the potluck dinner.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy cooking a hearty vegie stew during the colder months.
meanings.sent3: The chef's special was a delicious vegie bursting with flavors.
meanings.sent4: The vegie on the menu was a colorful medley of seasonal vegetables.
meanings.sent5: The restaurant's signature dish was a mouthwatering vegie lasagna.
